CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 2, 1953, pg. 6 reads: "Americanism Awards at St. Richard School - The students and faculty members and members of Kathryn Mae Joyce American Legion Post 509, shown above, took part in annual Americanism Day program at St. Richard School Tuesday. Americanism medal awards were given to Richard Sabatello and Elizabeth Machesney.  A world atlas and a scientific film strip were presented to the school.  Medal awards were made by Mrs. Loretta McGrew, commander of he World War nurses' post.  Her committee included Mrs. Eileen Brickley, Mrs. Sarah Swaney, Miss Diana Milligan, Miss Loretta Myers, Miss Irene Thompson, Mrs. Lulu Davis and Mrs. Catherine A. Crawford.-Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of students and faculty members of St. Richard School, and members of Jathryn Mae Joyce American Legion Post 509, gathered for the annual Americanism Day program, another version
